00008  *
00009  * \section conventions Library Conventions:
00010  *
00011  *              \subsection naming Naming
00012  *
00013  *              The name of the library should follow the pattern:
00014  *              \code
00015  *                              libpm{phidget_type_name}.so
00016  *              \endcode
00017  *              where <i>phidget_type_name</i> is in lower-case.
00018  *
00019  *              \subsection location Location
00020  *
00021  *              The libraries must be located in /usr/lib
00022  *
00023  */
